xdi2.core.security.signature.create

Class AESStaticSecretKeySignatureCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.security.signature.create.AbstractSignatureCreator<AESSignature>
      • xdi2.core.security.signature.create.AbstractAESSignatureCreator
        • xdi2.core.security.signature.create.AESSecretKeySignatureCreator
          • xdi2.core.security.signature.create.AESStaticSecretKeySignatureCreator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AESSignatureCreator, SignatureCreator<AESSignature>

    public class AESStaticSecretKeySignatureCreator
extends AESSecretKeySignatureCreator
    This is an AESSecretKeySignatureCreator that create an XDI AESSignature by obtaining secret keys from a statically configured list.
